channel.title: Can I monitor local traffic to `tor` in Whonix-Gateway?
channel.description: I can use `arm` in Whonix-Gateway to monitor, among other things, which circuits are used, i.e. *external* Tor traffic. Is there any way to monitor local traffic/connections between `tor` and different programs by port, IP address (when using multiple Workstations) etc.?

item.title: Can I monitor local traffic to `tor` in Whonix-Gateway?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Yes, using a package sniffer like wireshark.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I monitor local traffic to `tor` in Whonix-Gateway?

item.title: Can I monitor local traffic to `tor` in Whonix-Gateway?
item.dc:creator: ubestemt
item.description:
Seems this has yet to be implemented in arm: https://trac.torproject.org/projects/tor/ticket/5186

Read full topic
item.source: Can I monitor local traffic to `tor` in Whonix-Gateway?
